Explanatory notes: the daily maximum of vapor pressure deficit (VPD)*
the daily value of saturated water vapor pressure at the time of daily maximum VPD*
the daily value of actual water vapor pressure at the time of daily maximum VPD*

Column name: The dataset Data_VPD_Variability was used for the analyses described in paper section Data analysis - VPD variability. For more detailes about calculating of the reported microclimatic variables (daymax_VPD, daymax_Psat, daymin_Pair) see paper section Microclimate data processing.
